title: Accessories Product Design Engineer
summary: This is a hands-on individual contributor role. Will work with internal and external product development partners to create a variety of innovative accessories for Apple devices. Together, we will conceive, design, and bring into production products that will re-define and enhance the mobile experience. We will work closely with many different multi-functional teams including Industrial Design, Hardware Engineering, Antenna, Reliability, Safety and Marketing to provide guidance to best in class accessory development partners. Apply today!
description: Responsibilities include concept generation, architecture development, module integration, and knowledge transfer to development partners. Partner with internal resources for testing and analysis to ensure high quality product development and manufacturing. Guide development partners through custom component integration and test procedures. Oversee detailed engineering development and manufacturing ramp process.
key_qualifications:
4-7 years experience in mechanical design (preferably working experience in consumer electronics)
Product design leadership with oversight over multiple contributors/partners
Strong analytical/problem solving skills and general mechanical engineering analysis.
Fundamentals of engineering: strength of materials, material science, statics, heat transfer. Good understanding of different materials and grades.
Demonstrated expertise designing parts for a broad range of manufacturing processes: plastic injection molding, compression molding, metal stamping, metal injection molding, die casting, metal extrusion, metal machining, etc.
Multi-functional design skills including mechanism design, electro-mechanical integration and PCB mechanical design, design for high volume production (including statistical process control, fixture design, metrology)
Design validation skills including tolerance analysis, numerical analysis (FEA), mechanical prototyping, failure analysis, and design of experiments
Flexibility and comfort working in a quickly changing environment. Excellent teamwork and communication skills, both written and verbal. Able to communicate effectively to peers, subordinates, and executive staff.
This position will require domestic and international travel (15%).
